#install the blog king package

= New Install =

1. You should install the standard wordpress as usual

2. checkout the Blog King Package via [http://code.google.com/p/blog-king/source SVN] (as long as there is no separate download)

3. upload the Blog King sources onto your webspace

4. login and check your plugins area


= Install in existing Wordpress =

If you have a running wordpress with all kinds of plugins, you should make sure that your existing plugins are not already in the blog King package.

The simple way of doing this is just uploading the Blog King and enabling the different plugins areas (Frontend / Admin / ..) Then you can compare your addons and manually delete your old doubles.
